org.tensorics.core.testing.hamcrest

Class ScalarIsCloseTo<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>
      • org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<S>
        • org.tensorics.core.testing.hamcrest.ScalarIsCloseTo<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type of the scalars (elements of the field)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hamcrest.Matcher<S>, org.hamcrest.SelfDescribing

    public class ScalarIsCloseTo<S>
extends org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<S>
    A matcher for unit tests, that allows to set a tolerance value. This matcher uses the scalar support of tensorics, thus it can be used on any scalars fro which a field is provided.
